other_title: Nejimaki Seirei Senki: Tenkyō no Alderamin (Japanese)
ねじ巻き精霊戦記 天鏡のアルデラミン (Japanese)
plot: The Katvarna Empire is at war with the neighboring Republic of Kioka. In the Katvarna Empire, the lazy, woman-admiring Ikuta hates war, but due to certain circumstances, he grudgingly takes the High Grade Military Officer Exam. No one would have expected that this 17-year-old young man would eventually become a soldier called a great commander by others. Ikuta survives this world engulfed in war with his superior intellect.
opening_theme: "Tenkyō no Alderamin" (天鏡のアルデラミン; Alderamin on the Sky) by Kishida Kyōdan & The Akeboshi Rockets
